name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Propulsion Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

lessons.name: Combustion Processes
lessons.description: Understanding combustion processes and efficiency.

lessons.name: Combustion Instability
lessons.description: Understanding combustion instability and mitigation.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Performance
lessons.description: Understanding nozzle performance and efficiency.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

lessons.name: Basic Aerodynamics
lessons.description: Introduction to the basic principles of aerodynamics, including lift and drag.

lessons.name: Fluid Dynamics
lessons.description: Study of fluid dynamics principles applied to aerodynamics.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

lessons.name: Subsonic Flow Characteristics
lessons.description: Exploration of flow characteristics at subsonic speeds.

lessons.name: Supersonic Flow Dynamics
lessons.description: Study of shock waves and aerodynamic behavior at supersonic speeds.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

lessons.name: Heat Transfer in Aerodynamics
lessons.description: Understanding the principles of heat transfer in aerodynamic contexts.

lessons.name: Thermal Protection Systems
lessons.description: Overview of materials and systems used for thermal protection in aerospace.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

lessons.name: Structural Materials
lessons.description: Study of materials used in spacecraft construction and their properties.

lessons.name: Design Principles
lessons.description: Fundamental principles of spacecraft structural design.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

lessons.name: Orbital Dynamics
lessons.description: Introduction to the physics of orbital motion and dynamics.

lessons.name: Mission Planning
lessons.description: Strategies and considerations for planning space missions.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

lessons.name: Subsystem Integration
lessons.description: Study of the integration of various spacecraft subsystems.

lessons.name: Systems Engineering Principles
lessons.description: Understanding the principles of systems engineering in spacecraft design.

name: Introduction to Organic Chemistry
description: Fundamental concepts of organic chemistry.

lessons.name: Hydrocarbons
lessons.description: Overview of alkanes, alkenes, and alkynes, including their properties and reactions.

lessons.name: Functional Groups
lessons.description: Introduction to functional groups and their role in organic chemistry.

name: Organic Reaction Mechanisms
description: Study of various organic reaction mechanisms.

lessons.name: Substitution Reactions
lessons.description: Study of nucleophilic substitution reactions and mechanisms.

lessons.name: Elimination Reactions
lessons.description: Analysis of elimination reactions and their mechanisms.

name: Spectroscopy and Structure Determination
description: Techniques for determining the structure of organic compounds.

lessons.name: NMR Spectroscopy
lessons.description: Principles and applications of nuclear magnetic resonance in structure determination.

lessons.name: Mass Spectrometry
lessons.description: Introduction to mass spectrometry and its use in organic chemistry.

name: Introduction to Inorganic Chemistry
description: Basic principles and concepts of inorganic chemistry.

lessons.name: Periodic Table Trends
lessons.description: Overview of trends in the periodic table and their implications.

lessons.name: Bonding Theories
lessons.description: Study of bonding theories, including ionic and covalent bonds.

name: Coordination Chemistry
description: Understanding coordination complexes and their properties.

lessons.name: Complex Formation
lessons.description: Understanding the formation and properties of coordination complexes.

lessons.name: Crystal Field Theory
lessons.description: Exploration of crystal field theory and its applications.

name: Inorganic Reactions and Mechanisms
description: Study of inorganic reaction types and mechanisms.

lessons.name: Oxidation-Reduction Reactions
lessons.description: Understanding redox reactions and their applications in inorganic chemistry.

lessons.name: Acid-Base Reactions
lessons.description: Study of acid-base reactions and their role in inorganic processes.

name: Thermodynamics
description: Comprehensive study of thermodynamic principles.

lessons.name: Laws of Thermodynamics
lessons.description: Detailed study of the laws of thermodynamics and their applications.

lessons.name: Thermodynamic Processes
lessons.description: Analysis of various thermodynamic processes in chemistry.

name: Kinetics and Reaction Dynamics
description: Study of chemical kinetics and reaction dynamics.

lessons.name: Reaction Rates
lessons.description: Exploration of factors affecting reaction rates and rate laws.

lessons.name: Catalysis
lessons.description: Study of catalytic processes and their mechanisms.

name: Quantum Chemistry
description: Introduction to quantum mechanics and its application in chemistry.

lessons.name: Wave Functions and Operators
lessons.description: Study of wave functions, operators, and their significance in quantum chemistry.

lessons.name: Quantum Models of Atoms
lessons.description: Understanding quantum models of atoms and their applications.

name: Elvish Languages
description: Study of Elvish languages and their structures.

lessons.name: Sindarin
lessons.description: Introduction to Sindarin grammar and vocabulary.

lessons.name: Quenya
lessons.description: Study of Quenya syntax and phonetics.

lessons.name: Black Speech of Mordor

description: Study of philological aspects and linguistic evolution in Middle-earth.

lessons.name: Historical Contexts
lessons.description: Exploration of historical contexts and influences on language development.

lessons.name: Language Evolution
lessons.description: Study of language evolution and its impact on Middle-earth's cultures.

name: Historical Alliances
description: Study of historical alliances in Middle-earth.

lessons.description: Study of the Council of Elrond and its diplomatic significance.
